001.description:
Let's test your skills. For this experiment, prove that you know the basics
of how to launch a rocket, and overcome the gravitaional force

002.description:
This time, you'll be going outside the atmosphere. Using the previous formula,
 launch the rocket to the moon.

003.description:
Now that you've already mastered the basics, go somewhere beyond human comprehension.
 You must find the Creator. Find Him. Find our God
